|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = Nexcom |manuf_model = DNB-120-S |manuf_rev = VER C |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 10/2014 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIA2GW2KJ8089 |asin = B00OPEFXTU |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel]]'' Dual-Core Atom (@1.75GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L (SODIMM) *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, 64GB Transcend SATA SSD *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_sg_115_rev_2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = USB SATA ports: 64GB Transcend SATA SSD installed
Memory can be upgraded to 8GB by replacing SODIMM }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
